page.title: 09HOUSING IN LINTON
page.content: There are a few modern flats and bungalows but many of Linton's cottages and houses are over 100 years old. New flats are being built in the old mill and some of the cottages in Linton must be preserved in their original state.There is a lot of renovation work being carried out on old cottages which consists of new floors and sometimes a new damp-course,new bathrooms and kitchens. The problem with Linton is the same as elsewhere,in getting building plots,the cost is the next item,as a single plot will reach anything up to Â£45 000 per plot. The majority of people have double glazing,central heating and 3 bedrooms.The majority of houses are owned,not rented.
